title: Sampler, 1842
medium:
Medium: wool on cotton
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Counted stitches.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: An alphabet (missing the letter "J") and a set of numbers at the top and scattered floral and animal motifs at the bottom with initials.
